comment: Impossible to contact, not clear on test material ( or any material), did not do what he said about homework did not return grades before add drop date wouldn't return emails. One of the worst professors I've had at KSU.

Impossible to contact!!  Explains the material pretty well and 2 of the tests were open book.  Takes his time on giving back tests and did not let us know what any of our final averages were.  It was frustrating not knowing why I got a B instead of an A and not knowing if he took care of a homework issue for me like he said he would.

I completely agree with the previous comments. He makes the material more understandable than any other ACCT2200 professor. Tests curved, 2 open book. DO NOT COUNT ON BEING ABLE TO CONTACT HIM EVER - it won't happen. And unfortunately he takes his sweet time getting grades back. Boring but super nice. Totally worth taking overall.

I loved this professor. I would definitely recommend him to anyone at Kennesaw. He curved every test and even made 2 tests open note/book. The only thing I did not appreciate about him was the fact that when grades were due he didnt put ours in. He was a little hard to contact, but he had a lot going on with his family, so that was understandable.
